title: Juxtapose Functions in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of Juxtapose Functions in JavaScript. We will learn how to create a function that takes multiple functions as arguments and returns a new function that applies those functions to the same set of arguments, returning an array of the results. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to use Juxtapose Functions to simplify your code and make it more efficient.

meta.title: Juxtapose Functions in JavaScript | Programming Tutorial
meta.description: Explore the concept of Juxtapose Functions in JavaScript, learn how to create a function that applies multiple functions to the same set of arguments.
meta.keywords: Juxtapose Functions, JavaScript, Programming Tutorial, Function Composition, Functional Programming

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Executed
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: JavaScript 中的并置函数
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索 JavaScript 中并置函数的概念。我们将学习如何创建一个函数，该函数接受多个函数作为参数，并返回一个新函数，该新函数将这些函数应用于同一组参数，并返回结果数组。在本实验结束时，你将更好地理解如何使用并置函数来简化代码并提高其效率。

meta.title: JavaScript 中的并置函数 | 编程教程
meta.description: 探索 JavaScript 中并置函数的概念，学习如何创建一个将多个函数应用于同一组参数的函数。
meta.keywords: 并置函数, JavaScript, 编程教程, 函数组合, 函数式编程

verify.name: 验证已执行的 Node 命令
verify.hint: 通过在终端/SSH 中输入 'node' 并按回车键，可以运行 JavaScript。
